name: design-primer
title: Design Primer
description: Design a single optimized primer for PCR or sequencing
content:
Overview

This application designs a single optimized primer within specified GC content and melting temperature ranges.

Features

  • Customizable primer parameters
  • GC content optimization
  • Tm calculation
  • Flexible search window

Parameters

  • Sequence: Target DNA sequence
  • Start Position: Where to begin searching
  • Primer Length: Desired primer length
  • GC Range: Min/max GC content
  • Tm Range: Min/max melting temperature

Output

Returns primer sequence with position, GC content, and Tm.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/design_primer.py "${sequence}" ${startPos} --primer-length ${primerLength} --min-gc ${minGc} --max-gc ${maxGc} --min-tm ${minTm} --max-tm ${maxTm} --search-window ${searchWindow} -o "${outputDir}"
